title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5100.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5100.9 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing the name and business address of the
records access officer and appeals body and the location where records can be
seen or copied shall be posted in a conspicuous location wherever records are
kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5100.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
